Although the Lord is not pleased with the disobedient, because of his goodness "he will magnify the law and make it honorable" (NIV translates this phrase as the Lord will "make his law great and glorious"), meaning he will make the gospel great in the eyes of the world. Despite the unfaithful and hypocritical nature of some of the house of Israel, the honest in heart accept Christ because of the greatness of his law.
